author: Miami
title: Comment on London Promoter Bad Guy Toba Proposes to his Ghanaian Beauty Nana by Miami
text:
London Promoter Bad Guy Toba Proposes to his Ghanaian Beauty Nana 27.09.2016 at By BellaNaija Weddings 47 Comments Beauty and fashion entrepreneur Nana thought she was going on a girls night out with her girlfriends for a movie premiere at Curzon Cinema in Victoria, titled The Hidden Truth. She was to meet up afterwards with her love of 5 years Toba at Dstrkt in Mayfair, to celebrate his birthday with a dinner. Their love story, the groom-to-be said it ‚Äì ‚ÄúStarted from a Facebook message in 2011, then on Sunday 25th 2016, you agreed to marry me. I knew I found my soul mate the moment I saw you for the first time all those years ago Nana. Thank You For trusting in me‚Ä¶ Now let‚Äôs go show them how to get married in style #NanaToba2017 ‚ù§Ô∏èüá¨üá≠üá≥üá¨üíç
